# Ralph Dev System — Post-Review Fix Plan

## Context

The Ralph+Continuity alignment (commit `427c6b8`) was reviewed by a multi-agent audit in the NorthStar Transformation project. The review confirmed **2 Critical, 3 High, 5 Medium, 3 Low** issues. All findings were verified against actual code by 3 scout agents. This plan addresses all 13 issues organized into 5 parallel work units for /maestro delegation.
